title: Computer science midterm and final grades

content.description: Which of the following could be determined from the data?
content.question: I. The average total points earned per student II. The average increase in total points per student as a result of the score replacement policy III. The proportion of students who improved their total points as a result of the score replacement policy

skill.text: Skill 5.B: Explain how knowledge can be generated from data.
